no-locations-added: No locations added. To start tracking a location, search in the field above.
start-tracking: You are currently previewing this city, click the "+"  icon to start tracking this city.
search-city-state: Search for a City or State ...
modal-title: The Local Weather allows you to track the current and future weather of cities of your choosing.
search-for-city: Search for your city by entering the name into the search bar.
select-city: Select a city within the results, this will take you to the current weather for your selection.
track-city: Track the city by clicking on the "+" icon in the top right. This will save the city to view at a later time on the home page.
untrack-city: If you no longer wish to track a city, simply select the city within the home page. At the bottom of the page, there will be am option to delete the city.
